Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
11.09.2014 SH SCR19140 Added test SCFH_SCSP_NO <> 3 (PR) to perform BSF406C
10.03.2014 SH SCR18766 BSF406D Set BMQ005.PI.HOFF_CODE = SCF if SFIP_ADMNO =0
09.12.2013 SH SCR18575 Changed logic to determine errors in SFIP/SFIN to submit BSF407
02.07.2013 SH SCR18245 BSF406B test 24 / BSF406C: Changed tests regarding preadvice days
03.04.2013 GB SCR18074 24. Check if payment is expected: Extended condition
24.12.2012 GB SCR17818 BSF406B test 24 and BSF406C: Call the program BSF128 instead of the BPH128
10.12.2012 SH SCR17778 BSF406B Skip test 24 (payments exceeded) in case of SCSP_NO = 3 (Prime)
10.01.2011 SH SCR16119 Added test to call BSF407 only if SFIP_PAYMENTAMOUNT > 0
19.11.2010 SH SCR16001 BSF406B Extended test 25/26 with test on
18.11.2010 SH SCR15990 Added update SCFH_STATUS = 12 after BSF406C
15.11.2010 SH SCR15979 BSF406A Test 1: Added test SFIN_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0;
BSF406B Added test SFIN_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and new test 27
08.10.2010 SH SCR15861 Extended test to perform BSF406C (beneficiary = FI)
04.10.2010 GB SCR15841 Changed condition for update in parts
25. Check if beneficiary is correct (ING),
26. Check if beneficiary is correct (Supplier) in the BSF406B
07.09.2010 SH SCR15781 BSF406C Re-wrote module
31.08.2010 SH SCR15755 BSF406B Added tests 24/25/26; Added new module
BSF406C "Test for missing invoices in preadvice file)
-- Check for errors in SFIN
1. Test if payment amount is correct

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(SFIN_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SFIN where SFIN_SFIP_NO = :2 and SFIN_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Reset variables
-- 20. Check if invoice is found
-- 21. Check if invoice is open
-- 22. Check if amount is correct
-- 23. Check if currency is correct
-- 24. Check if payment is expected (not for Prime Revenue --> SCSP_NO =3)
-- 25. Check if beneficiary is correct (ING)
-- 26. Check if beneficiary is correct (Supplier)
-- 27. Check if invoice is already handled

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_DUEDATE from :1/INVO exception join :1/SFIN on SFIN_DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and SFIN_INVO_NO = INVO_NO and SFIN_ERRORCODE <> 41 where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Update SFIN_NO
